attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: not only did the app take days to download but once it finally downloaded and i opened it, my cat started screeching and clawing at the walls. by the mere appearance of this ghastly app my pets were bouncing all over the place. i’ve also contracted hives by typing my phone number into the app. do not recommend.

attributes.title: Dump trump 🤷‍♀️
attributes.review: I thought this app will enlighten me. Then my phone started glitching. Maybe it’s the universe telling me something. Or maybe this app needs to be updated.
